nodes.text: A fedora was a hat of archaeological significance.
The fedora was a type of hat in the galaxy. Though fedoras were typically colored brown, they could come in a wide variety of hues.
They were considered archaeologically significant, and at least one spacer was known to have worn this type of hat during 1 ABY.

The in-universe version of this fedora obviously alludes to the real-world fedora worn by Indiana Jones. Whenever Indiana Jones makes a Star Wars appearance, he is usually wearing this type of fedora.

The hat was identified as a fedora in the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies. The game developers temporarily reactivated the accounts of many players who unsubscribed from the game between January 1, 2008 and September 15, 2010. To encourage these players to log on, the developers offered all active players a free fedora and whip. These items would only be given to players who logged on between November 23 and November 30. On the 30th, the developers gave players the option to turn the decorative version of the fedora into a wearable version, which could be colored up to two times.
